text:
Goodie Mob are an American hip hop music band. They are based in Atlanta, Georgia. CeeLo Green (born as Thomas Callaway), Khujo (born as Willie Knighton, Jr.), T-Mo Goodie (born as Robert Barnett) and Big Gipp (born as Cameron Gipp) formed the band in 1991. They are best known for their single "Sell Therapy".
Goodie Mob means the GOOD DIE Mostly Over Bullshit.
This group was only for rappers born in Atlanta, Georgia and supported Dungeon Family, Nate Dogg, Outkast, amongst others.
Cee-Lo was the best member of this band, and went to record with DJ Danger Mouse (born as Gnarls Barkely).
